newsitem.title: USA: Nortek Inc issues $175 mln 144A notes.
newsitem.headline: Nortek Inc issues $175 mln 144A notes.

text.p: The following high-yield debt issue from Nortek Inc was priced in the 144A private placement market on Wednesday, the company said.

Proceeds from the issue will be used to repay approximately $47.2 million outstanding debt, fund acquisitions and other general corporate purposes, said Richard Bready, chairman and chief executive officer.
Nortek manufactures and markets residential, commercial and industrial building products.
Bear, Stearns & Co was lead manager on the deal.
